alert.note: Alert for Northern Nye County - Mojave (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 12 at 2:20PM PDT until June 12 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Dry and Windy across much of Central NV today... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 426... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM PDT MONDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 426... The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM to 8 PM PDT Monday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 426 Northern Nye County- Mojave. * Winds...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity will create critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
